actions.command: execute unless entity @e[tag=THROW] run summon minecraft:block_display ~ ~-100 ~ {transformation:{left_rotation:[0f,0f,0f,1f],right_rotation:[0f,0f,0f,1f],translation:[0f,0f,0f],scale:[0.01f,0.01f,10f]},block_state:{Name:"purple_wool"},NoGravity:1b,Tags:["THROW","NAN"]}
execute at @s positioned ~ ~0.7 ~ run execute positioned ^-0.4 ^ ^ facing entity @e[tag=GRABBED,limit=1] feet run tp @e[tag=THROW] ^ ^ ^ ~ ~-5
execute positioned ^ ^ ^5 run tag @e[distance=..5,tag=!NAN,limit=1,sort=nearest,type=!item] add GRABBED
execute if score Health: Data > Health0 Timer run damage @e[tag=GRABBED,limit=1] 3

badges.text:
§b§lHold %s:§r
§d- To §eGRAB§d objects and display their data§r
§d- And hold §r[Sneak]§d to §eCORRUPT§d objects§r
§d- Corruption cuts objects health and tp them random

name: §a§nData Corruption
description: §dCorr behaves like a malware. He can read and corrupt sensitive data. To do this Corr's Nerves has to have a direct contact with his fake body and his target.
